[[The Lonely Mountain Band]] | released=[[22 September|September 22]], [[2010]] | recorded= | genre=Folk | length= | language=English | label= }} '''''Beyond the Western Seas''''' is the first album by the folk band ''[[The Lonely Mountain Band]]''.
